name: 林郁修
objective:
類神經網路具有 universal approximation 的特性 (非線性函數近似器)；因此，其可被應用於控制器設計。另外，其也可被應用於解決分類 / 時間序列預測問題。本課程內容包含：(1) 介紹，(2) 類神經網路，(3) 類神經網路應用於分類問題，(4) 類神經網路應用於迴歸 (函數近似) 問題，(5) 類神經網路應用於時間序列資料預測問題，及 (6) 應用。
This course covers important concepts and topics of Artificial Neural Networks (ANN) that can be developed and used to solve classification or function approximation problems. The outline of this course is given as follows. (1) Introduction, (2) ANN, (3) ANN applied in classification, (4) ANN applied in function approximation, (5) ANN applied in time-series data forecasting, and (6) Applications.
